comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Robert Bridges, the English poet. See hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/cph.3c05774 for another picture. He was appointed (British) poet laureate in 1913. See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Bridges

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for your research swanq.  We'll fill in the name the next time we update this record.
